name: Meridian One Features
author: MeridianThemes

sections.faq:
Why do I need this plugin with Meridian One theme:

This plugin adds widgets that are used on the homepage of the theme. The widgets are not part of the theme because widgets are “plugin-territory” and are not allowed in themes.

Can I use it with other themes?

Sure, the custom widgets will work with other themes but the primary purpose is to extend “Meridian One” theme.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Deprecated function notice fix

1.0.1

  • Added widgets and custom post types for the Plus version of Meridian One theme

1.0

  • Initial release
sections.description:
Why do I need this plugin with Meridian One theme:

This plugin adds widgets that are used on the homepage of the theme. The widgets are not part of the theme because widgets are “plugin-territory” and are not allowed in themes.

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Meridian One Features’
  3. Activate the plugin from your Plugins page.

Manually

  1. Upload the meridian-one-features folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
